name: The Treasure of Coltiz Castle
tagline: Created as a class project in fall 2013.
body:
![A screenshot.](http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w464/quantumleaf7895/Justathing.png)

In the fall of 2013 I took a course in functional programming.  The final project was to create a text adventure game, drawing some code from projects earlier in the year; this is the final result.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
